data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Îles Crozet to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Îles Crozet, French Southern Territories
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Îles Crozet with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Îles Crozet, French Southern Territories.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Îles Crozet to agree with you and with one another.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Îles Crozet, French Southern Territories who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Îles Crozet, French Southern Territories, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 96 lost in Îles Crozet that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
